events.title: Events
events.description: Fire an event on the event bus.
events.alert_event_type: Event type is a mandatory field

services.title: Services
services.description: The service dev tool allows you to call any available service in Home Assistant.
services.yaml_parameters: Parameters only available in YAML mode
services.accepts_target: This service accepts a target, for example: `entity_id: light.bed_light`
services.no_template_ui_support: The UI does not support templates, you can still use the YAML editor.

states.title: States
states.description1: Set the current state representation of an entity within Home Assistant.
states.description2: If the entity belongs to a device, there will be no actual communication with that device.

templates.title: Template
templates.description: Templates are rendered using the Jinja2 template engine with some Home Assistant specific extensions.
templates.time: This template updates at the start of each minute.
templates.all_listeners: This template listens for all state changed events.
templates.no_listeners: This template does not listen for any events and will not update automatically.
templates.listeners: This template listens for the following state changed events:

issues.units_changed: Jedinica ovog entiteta se promenila iz "'{metadata_unit}'' u "{state_unit}".
issues.unsupported_state_class: Državna klasa ''{state_class}}'' ovog entiteta nije podržana.
issues.entity_not_recorded: Ovaj entitet je isključen iz zapisa.
issues.entity_no_longer_recorded: Ovaj entitet se više ne snima.
issues.no_state: Nema dostupnog stanja za ovaj entitet.
issues.unsupported_unit_metadata: Jedinica ('{metadata_unit}') zapisane statistike ne podudara se sa podržanom jedinicom "'{supported_unit}'' klase uređaja ''{device_class}}''.
issues.unsupported_unit_state: Jedinica ('{state_unit}') ovog entiteta ne podudara se sa jedinicom klase uređaja "'{device_class}".

units_changed.title: Jedinica ovog entiteta se promenila
units_changed.update: Ažurirajte istorijske statističke vrednosti sa ''{metadata_unit}'' u ''{state_unit}}''
units_changed.clear: Izbriši sve stare statističke podatke za ovaj entitet

validation.heading: Check and Restart
validation.introduction: A basic validation of the configuration is automatically done before restarting. The basic validation ensures the YAML configuration doesn't have errors which will prevent Home Assistant or any integration from starting. It's also possible to only do the basic validation check without restarting.
validation.valid: Configuration will not prevent Home Assistant from starting!

reloading.heading: YAML configuration reloading
reloading.introduction: Some parts of Home Assistant can reload without requiring a restart. Clicking one of the options below will unload their current YAML configuration and load the new one.
reloading.group: Groups, group entities, and notify services

server_management.heading: Home Assistant
server_management.confirm_restart_text: Restarting Home Assistant will stop all your active dashboards, automations and scripts.
server_management.confirm_stop: Are you sure you want to stop Home Assistant?
